message: Let's divide fairly, I'll get a bit more
I understand you wanting a larger share, but I need a reasonable cut too. This offer ensures we both benefit.
Considering the inflation, my share remains the same, but I'm willing to give you a bit more
Alice, inflation is eating into my gains. I need you to meet me closer to the middle for this to work.
Bob, your share may be losing value, but I'm not going to give up too much. Meet me here and we can end this
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm proposing a perfectly even split to end this now before inflation eats away at any chance of a good deal for me.
You may think 50/50 is fair, but considering the inflation, I'm already giving you a better deal than that
Alice, this is my final offer. I understand your position, but I'm heavily disadvantaged by the inflation. If you reject this, I'll have to prioritize avoiding a total loss over a fair split.
